data.title: Penta Zero Miedo clasifica a Money In The Bank en la WWE y el Hijo el Vikingo hace aparición en RAW
data.description:
Penta Zero Miedo clasificó este lunes al PPV Money In The Bank de la WWE tras ganar su combate en RAW, show en el que el Hijo de Vikingo hizo una aparición previo a su debut en un evento de la empresa de Estados Unidos.El luchador mexicano confirmó su participación en el siguiente Pay Per View de la WWE, luego de que venció a Dragon Lee y Chad Gable en su lucha de triple amenaza en RAW.Penta cortó la racha de tres peleas sin ganar en la empresa de Estados Unidos y ahora apunta al siguiente gran evento de la empresa y en el que buscará volver a ganar un oportunidad titular.Hijo del Vikingo aparece en el triunfo de Penta Zero MiedoEn el inicio del combate, Penta Zero Miedo y Dragon Lee hicieron una alianza para liquidar primero a Gable, pero el trabajo en equipo duró poco y enseguida comenzaron el castigo entre ellos.Luego de un lapso de intercambio de golpes entre los mexicanos, Chad entró de nuevo al ring para iniciar con un dominio y repartió a sus rivales, hasta que el Zero Miedo aplicó un castigó a ambos.Dragon Lee también tuvo su turno para dominar el combate, además de que en un momento hizo un lance desde el ring para castigar a Penta contra la mesa de comentaristas, y momentos después Gable golpeó al Hijo del Vikingo.Al parecer Chad Gable no puede esperar a #WorldsCollide y decidió atacar esta noche al hijo del Vikingo ???? #WWERaw pic.twitter.com/1E7AuJScox— WWE Español (@wweespanol) May 27, 2025


Más tarde, el luchador de la Triple A tomó revancha con una patada fulminante que dejó muy dañado a Chad, quien a su vez fue castigado por Dragon Lee, y enseguida Penta aplicó un Mexican Destroyer sobre su compatriota.EL Zero Miedo terminó con el combate aplicando su finisher sobre Gable, logrando la cuenta de tres y ganando su lugar en Money In The Bank, donde buscará una nueva pelea titular en la WWE.PENTA CLASIFICA A #MITB ????????#WWERaw pic.twitter.com/SnVUGNtO3j— WWE Español (@wweespanol) May 27, 2025

data.title: Colectivos piden sanción penal para funcionarios que obstaculicen búsqueda de desaparecidos
data.description: Colectivos de buscadoras pidieron que en las futuras reformas, presentadas por el gobierno federal, se incluya que los funcionarios que obstaculicen o retrasen las investigaciones en torno a personas desaparecidas sean castigados penalmente por la gravedad de sus actos. Luego de participar en la segunda reunión de seguimiento con madres buscadoras, María Luisa Núñez, del colectivo Voz de los desaparecidos en Puebla, explicó que la intención es equiparar las sanciones del delito de desaparición con las omisiones o irresponsabilidad de un funcionario encargado de investigar este delito.¿Qué dijo la madre buscadora?“Hoy las sanciones que existen en contra de los funcionarios públicos que no realizan su trabajo son prácticamente administrativas o menos, pero dada la gravedad del problema en que trascienden sus omisiones o la dilación que como consecuencia trae la permanencia de la desaparición, que esta responsabilidad de las autoridades se equipare a la desaparición propia. Y que entonces sean sancionados con penas tan altas y tan graves como lo amerita su irresponsabilidad u omisión en las investigaciones”, expresó. Este encuentro que se llevó a cabo de manera privada en la sede de Gobernación se extendió por más de cinco horas.Según los participantes, hasta ahora se mantiene la confianza de que las autoridades están atendiendo las peticiones de los colectivos. “De repente pareciera que no se logra comprender muy bien en la mesa, sin embargo, en términos generales me parece que ha sido una reunión que pudiéramos sentir avances, como ser escuchados”, agregó. Núñez subrayó que además de las propuestas para fortalecer las reformas, se le ha insistido a la autoridad la necesidad de aplicar la ley. “El problema es que no se ha implementado como debe ser, de manera integral, y eso es lo que mantiene a nuestro país en esta crisis de desaparición de personas, y pues también de crisis en términos de investigación por parte de las fiscalías de búsqueda por parte de las comisiones y de identificación humana por parte de los Semefos y las fiscalías que van de la mano”, apuntó.Últimas noticias de madres buscadorasMadres que se han organizado para tratar de encontrar a sus seres queridos enTamaulipas, afirman hay un nuevo comisionado de búsqueda y no fueron consultadas para su nombramiento, por lo que esperan dé resultados.La Asociación Civil Milynali Red de Madres Buscadoras, dio a conocer que la designación del nuevo titular ya se hizo, pues Cristian Morales Labastida es quien se está presentando con los diferentes colectivos en el estado.La agrupación señala que desconoce cómo trabaja el servidor público, pero estarán atentas a sus resultados y advierten que harán saber cualquier inconformidad sobre su desempeño en tan delicada encomienda.RM
data.translatedTitle: Groups ask for criminal sanction for officials who hinder the search for missing
data.translatedDescription: Colectivos de buscadoras pidieron que en las futuras reformas, presentadas por el gobierno federal, se incluya que los funcionarios que obstaculicen o retrasen las investigaciones en torno a personas desaparecidas sean castigados penalmente por la gravedad de sus actos. After participating in the second monitoring meeting with Mothers, María Luisa Núñez, of the voice of the disappeared in Puebla, explained that the intention is to equate the sanctions of the crime of disappearance with the omissions or irresponsibility of an official in charge of investigating this crime. What did the mother seek? severity of the problem in which they transcend their omissions or the delay that as a consequence brings the permanence of the disappearance, that this responsibility of the authorities is equated with the own disappearance. This meeting that took place privately at the headquarters of the Interior extended for more than five hours. According to the participants, so far the confidence is maintained that the authorities are attending the requests of the groups. "Suddenly it seems that it is not possible to understand very well at the table, however, in general terms it seems to me that it has been a meeting that we could feel advances, such as listened to," he added. Núñez stressed that in addition to the proposals to strengthen reforms, the need to apply the law has been insisted. "The problem is that it has not been implemented as it should be, in an integral way, and that is what keeps our country in this crisis of disappearance of people, and also of crisis in terms of investigation by the search prosecutors by the commissions and human identification by the sections and the prosecutors that go hand in hand," he said. Entamoulipas, they claim there is a new search commissioner and were not consulted for their appointment, so they expect results. The Millynali Civil Association Network of Mothers, announced that the designation of the new head They warn that they will let any disagreement know about their performance in such a delicate parcel.

data.title: Santander otorgará 2.7 mdp en becas de manutención a universitarios este 2025
data.description: Banco Santander México anunció un incremento en su programa de becas de manutención para 2025, por lo que, la inversión total destinada al programa ascenderá a 2.7 millones de pesos.De acuerdo con la institución financiera, esta ampliación responde a la alta demanda que ha registrado el programa en años anteriores.“Las becas de manutención se han convertido en unas de las más solicitadas debido al impacto real que tienen en la vida de quienes las reciben. Por ello hemos decidido aumentar la oferta de este programa”, afirmó Arturo Cherbowski Lask, director ejecutivo de Santander Universidades. “Se trata de un apoyo concreto y que hace la diferencia cuando la continuidad de los estudios puede verse comprometida por la falta de recursos”, añadió.¿Quiénes pueden aplicar para la beca?En esta cuarta edición de la Beca Santander Apoyo a la Manutención 2025, se otorgarán 300 apoyos económicos a estudiantes universitarios.Los alumnos que sean seleccionados en el programa, recibirán un apoyo único de 9 mil pesos.La convocatoria está dirigida a estudiantes mayores de 16 años que cursen estudios técnicos, de licenciatura, maestría o doctorado en instituciones tanto públicas como privadas.Uno de los requisitos es ser estudiante regular en su programa actual.Los estudiantes interesados podrán registrarse hasta el 21 de julio de 2025 a través del sitio oficial en este enlace.Los seleccionados serán notificados directamente en su perfil de la plataforma, el 3 de septiembre del mismo año.El impulso de programas dirigidos a estudiantes, reafirman el compromiso con la juventud mexicana, fortalecen tanto el acceso como la permanencia en la educación superior y abren nuevas oportunidades para que más estudiantes alcancen sus metas académicas.KL
data.translatedTitle: Santander will grant 2.7 MDP in scholarship scholarships to university students this 2025
data.translatedDescription: Banco Santander Mexico announced an increase in its maintenance scholarship program by 2025, so, the total investment for the program will amount to 2.7 million pesos. According to the financial institution, this extension responds to the high demand that the program has registered in previous years. “The maintenance scholarships have become some of the most requested due to the real impact they have in the life of those who receive them. The offer of this program, ”said Arturo Cherbowski Lask, executive director of Santander Universities. "This is a specific support and that makes the difference when the continuity of the studies can be compromised by the lack of resources," he added. Who can apply for the scholarship? In this fourth edition of the Santander scholarship support for the maintenance 2025, 300 economic support will be awarded to university students. Students who are selected in the program will receive a unique support of 9 thousand pesos. that study technical studies, degree, mastery or doctorate in both public and private institutions. One of the requirements is to be a regular student in their current program. Interested students can register until July 21, 2025 through the official site in this link. The selected ones will be notified directly in their profile of the platform, on September 3 of the same year. The impulse of programs aimed They strengthen both access and permanence in higher education and open new opportunities for more students to reach their academic goals.

data.title: Legisladores piden resolver desabasto de medicinas en entidades federativas
data.description: Legisladores de las bancadas opositoras presentarán ante la Comisión Permanente del Congreso de la Unión un punto de acuerdo para emplazar a las autoridades del sector salud a resolver el desabasto de medicinas en diversas entidades, debido a los adeudos a proveedores y laboratorios.Ello, después de que la presidenta Claudia Sheinbaum sostuvo el pasado viernes una reunión con gobernadores para revisar el estado de la transición de los sistemas estatales de salud al IMSS-Bienestar, donde algunos mandatarios manifestaron su preocupación por el desabasto de medicamentos y la presión social ante la insuficiente atención médica.Pacientes con cáncer, diabetes y VIH, afectados por desabasto ​​En ese contexto, el coordinador del PRI en el Senado de la República, Manuel Añorve, advirtió que el desabasto de medicamentos ha alcanzado niveles alarmantes.Debido a que miles de pacientes con cáncer, diabetes y VIH han sufrido la interrupción de sus tratamientos por la falta de insumos en hospitales públicos, lo cual obliga a sus familias a conseguirlos en farmacias privadas a costos inalcanzables.Ante tal crisis, la bancada priista presentó dos iniciativas para terminar con la escasez de fármacos y garantizar que ningún mexicano se quede sin tratamiento por falta de recursos.Según explicaron los legisladores del PRI, uno de los principales factores que explican el desabasto es el adeudo con proveedores, heredado del extinto Insabi, cuya deuda acumulada fue transferida al IMSS-Bienestar y supera los 12 mil millones de pesos, según datos del sector. “Este pasivo ha dificultado la regularización de pagos y, por tanto, la continuidad en el suministro de insumos, medicamentos y servicios. Aunque el gobierno federal ha realizado adelantos financieros para reducir esta carga, diversas entidades aún enfrentan restricciones operativas”, subrayaron.Falta de pagos habría limitado capacidad de compra de medicamentosExpusieron que la situación es particularmente compleja en estados como Oaxaca, donde, además del rezago financiero, diversos proveedores y personal médico acusan al jefe de los Servicios de Atención a la Salud del IMSS-Bienestar, Adán Pacheco Ramírez, de retrasar la validación de servicios ya prestados, impidiendo así procesar los pagos correspondientes.Todo ello ha derivado en la suspensión de servicios en hospitales y unidades médicas, afectando la atención de personas con padecimientos crónicos, necesidades urgentes y tratamientos en curso.De acuerdo con testimonios de proveedores, la falta de pagos ha limitado su capacidad de adquisición de medicamentos e insumos, lo que ha impactado directamente en la cadena de suministro, mientras usuarios del sistema han reportado públicamente la falta de atención en distintas regiones del estado, generando inconformidad y llamados a la intervención de autoridades estatales y federales.IOGE
data.translatedTitle: Legislators ask to resolve medicine shortages in federative entities
data.translatedDescription: Legislators of the opposition benches will present before the Permanent Commission of the Congress of the Union a point of agreement to place the authorities of the health sector to resolve the shortage of medicines in various entities, due to the debts to suppliers and laboratories. IMSS-Bienestar, where some leaders expressed concern about the shortage of medicines and social pressure against insufficient medical care. Cancer patients, diabetes and HIV, affected by shortage in that context, the PRI coordinator in the Senate of the Republic, Manuel Añorve, warned that the shortage of medications has reached alarming levels. Cancer patients, diabetes and HIV have suffered the interruption of their treatments due to the lack of supplies in public hospitals, which forces their families to get them in private pharmacies at unattainable costs. Before such crisis, the PRI bench presented two initiatives to end the shortage of drugs and ensure that no Mexican stays without treatment due to lack of resources. Of the main factors that explain the shortage is the debt with suppliers, inherited from the extinct Insabi, whose accumulated debt was transferred to the IMSS-white and exceeds 12 billion pesos, according to data from the sector. "This liability has hindered the regularization of payments and, therefore, the continuity in the supply of supplies, medications and services. Although the federal government has made financial advances to reduce this load, various entities still face operational restrictions," Financial, various providers and medical staff accuse the head of the health care services of the IMSS-Bienestar, Adam Pacheco Ramírez, to delay the validation of services already provided, thus preventing processing the corresponding payments. All this has resulted in the suspension of services in hospitals and medical units, affecting the attention of people with chronic suffering, urgent needs and ongoing treatments. Suppliers, the lack of payments has limited its capacity to acquire medicines and supplies, which has directly impacted the supply chain, while system users have publicly reported the lack of attention in different regions of the State, generating disagreement and called to the intervention of state and federal authorities.ioge

data.title: Petro-7 comprará negocio de gasolineras a Shell en México
data.description: Grupo Iconn, operadores de la marca Petro-7 en México, acordaron adquirir el negocio de Shell Mobility en México.De acuerdo a un comunicado interno de la empresa, firmado por Luis Chapa, presidente del consejo y director general ejecutivo de la compañía, esta operación está sujeta a la autorización por parte de los reguladores competentes, lo cual podría ocurrir en el tercer trimestre de este año.¿Por qué quieren adquirir Shell?Destacan que Shell es una marca con presencia relevante a nivel internacional y de alto reconocimiento en la nación.Esto se debe a que su portafolio de servicios incluye, además de las gasolineras operadas de forma directa y por concesionarios, tiendas de conveniencia, una plataforma de gestión de flotas Shell Solutions y el negocio de suministro de combustibles. Expusieron que esta adquisición representa una oportunidad estratégica para la empresa para fortalecer la posición del grupo en el mercado.“Hasta que el proceso de aprobación y transición se complete, ambas compañías continuarán operando como actualmente, de forma independiente y serán consideradas como competidoras”, señalaron.Pero una vez concluida la operación, Iconn asumirá la gestión de las estaciones de Shell en México, pero mantendrá la marca, trabajará para asegurar una integración ordenada y eficiente en la operación del grupo.Presencia de Shell y Petro-7 en MéxicoDe acuerdo con el sistema de Shell, la empresa cuenta con 204 gasolineras activas, menor a las 247 que llegó a tener en 2023, de acuerdo con el reporte de algunos medios. Por otra parte Petro-7tiene operación en diez estados del país como Nuevo León, Ciudad de México, Jalisco, entre otros; con más de 2 mil 900 colaboradores en los que atienden diariamente a 235 mil clientes. Grupo Iconn también tiene la operación de las tiendas 7-Eleven, así como las empresas MAS Bodega y Logística y MercaDía. “Es nuestra compañía operadora de combustibles en proceso de expansión. Ofrecemos a nuestros consumidores ubicaciones convenientes, atención las 24 horas, variedad de métodos de pago y servicio de calidad, entregando siempre litros exactos”, dicen en su portal.KL
data.translatedTitle: Petro-7 will buy gas stations from Shell in Mexico
data.translatedDescription: ICONN Group, Operators of the Petro-7 brand in Mexico, agreed to acquire the Shell Mobility business in Mexico. According to an internal statement of the company, signed by Luis Chapa, president of the Council and the company's executive general director, this operation is subject to authorization by the competent regulators, which could happen in the third quarter of this year. Why do you want to acquire Shell? with relevant presence at the international level and high recognition in the nation. This is due to the fact that its service portfolio includes, in addition to the gas stations operated directly and by concessionaires, convenience stores, a Shell Solution Fleet Management platform and the fuel supply business. They explained that this acquisition represents a strategic opportunity for the company to strengthen the position of the group in the market. "Until the approval and transition process is completed, both companies will continue to operate as currently, independently and will be considered as competencers," they said. Group operation. SHELL and PETRO-7 PRESENCE IN MEXICODE AGREEMENT WITH THE SHELL SYSTEM, THE COMPANY HAS 204 ACTIVE GASSOLINE, LESS THAN 247 THAT HAPPENED IN 2023, ACCORDING TO THE REPORT OF SOME MEDIA. On the other hand Petro-7 has operation in ten states of the country such as Nuevo León, Mexico City, Jalisco, among others; With more than 2,900 collaborators in which they serve 235 thousand clients daily. Grupo Iconn also has the operation of 7-Eleven stores, as well as the most winery and logistics and mercadía companies. "It is our fuel operating company in the process of expansion. We offer our consumers convenient locations, 24 -hour attention, a variety of quality payment methods and service, always delivering exact liters," they say in its portal. KL

data.title: Presunto líder de 'Los Antrax', grupo criminal asentado en la colonia Morelos de CdMx, opera desde prisión
data.description:
El periodista y conductor del programa C4 en Alerta, Carlos Jiménez, informó que autoridades capitalinas identificaron que el líder de la célula criminal Los Antrax, establecida en la Ciudad de México, opera desde prisión. El presunto líder criminal es identificado como Carlos Jair "N", El Pity, un delincuente que fue detenido hace dos años, es decir en 2023, y que desde entonces se encuentra preso en el reclusorio Norte, ubicado en la calle Jaime Nuno, en la colonia Guadalupe Chalma, de la alcaldía Gustavo A. Madero.¿Qué se sabe de El Pity?La fuente reveló que al momento de su detención, el líder criminal le ofreció a los policías de la Secretaría de Seguridad Ciudadana (SSC) de la Ciudad de México un millón de pesos para qué lo soltaran, sin embargo, las autoridades capitalinas se negaron. Las investigaciones señalan que El Pity, además de controlar desde prisión organizaciones criminales como Los Antrax y Los Paraguayos, es cercano a los altos mandos deLa Unión Tepito.  Desde el reclusorio Norte, el supuesto delincuente sigue mandando a sus cómplices a extorsionar negocios, amenazar comerciantes y atacar a balazos algunos puestos. Además, de que presume fotografías tomadas desde la cárcel, lo que infiere que tiene un celular en su celda. Durante el programa se reveló que el presunto delincuente es muy cercano a un alto mando de La Unión Tepito identificado como El Tomate, uno de los supuestos implicados en la balacera ocurrida en la Plaza Garibaldi, en septiembre de 2018, que dejó como resultado seis personas sin vida y siete heridas.Ante estos motivos, las autoridades capitalinas ya buscan trasladar a El Pity a un penal federal.Fotos de El Pity desde prisión▶️ ¡Los maneja desde prisión! 'El Pity' sigue dando órdenes a sus delincuentes a pesar de estar preso en el Reclusorio Norte, manda a Los Antrax' y a 'Los Paraguayos' a extorsionar.???? Sigue informado con Carlos Jiménez (@c4jimenez) en #C4EnAlerta pic.twitter.com/SVvp3eEMkM— @telediario (@telediario) May 27, 2025


¿Qué se sabe de Los Antrax?Los Antrax son una célula armada de La Unión Tepito que opera en la colonia Morelos, en la alcaldía Venustiano Carranza.A inicios de año, el periodista C4 Jiménez informó de una célula conformada por menores de edad que también formaba parte de La Unión Tepito, la cual se hace llama UJ-40.Dicha organización criminal fue dada a conocer gracias a un video en el que se ve que están torturando a una persona, a quien le obligan a disculparse con Los Antrax:Sicario: “¡Pide perdón o te meto un trompón! (sic)”.Víctima: “¡Perdón!”Sicarios: “¿A los qué”.Víctima: “A los MTC”.Sicarios: “¿Y a quién más?”Víctima: “Y a Los Antrax".Sin embargo, esto no fue suficiente para frenar la tortura, pues los presuntos criminales seguían golpeando a la víctima mientras le pedían que explicara por qué se estaba disculpando.Sicario: “¿Por qué? (...) ¿por qué wey?”Víctima: “¡Ay carnal! ¿por qué, pues dime tú por qué?”.Sicario: “Ya di perdón”.Víctima: “Perdón”.Sicarios: “¿Perdón a quién?”Víctima: “A los MTC”.Sicarios: “¿Y a quién más?”Víctima: “Y a Los Antrax".Finalmente, se observa como la víctima vuelve a recibir un golpe en la cabeza.​RM

The alleged criminal leader is identified as Carlos Jair "N", El Pity, a criminal who was arrested two years ago, that is, in 2023, and that since then he is imprisoned in the northern prison, located on Jaime Nuno street, in the Guadalupe Chalma neighborhood, of the mayor's office Gustavo A. Madero. What is known about El Pity? He offered the police of the Ministry of Citizen Security (SSC) of Mexico City a million pesos for what they released it, however, the capital authorities denied. The investigations indicate that the Pity, in addition to controlling from prison criminal organizations such as Antrax and Paraguayans, is close to the high command of the Tepito Union.  From the northern prison, the alleged offender continues to send his accomplices to extort business, threaten merchants and attack some positions. In addition, that he presumes photographs taken from jail, which infers that he has a cell phone in his cell. During the program it was revealed that the alleged offender is very close to a high command of the Tepito Union identified as the tomato, one of the assumptions involved in the shooting in the Plaza Garibaldi, in September 2018, which resulted in six people without life and seven wounds. data.title: Talma anuncia inversión de 9 mdd para almacén de carga en el AIFA
data.description: La empresa de servicios aeroportuarios, Talma, informó que invertirá 9 millones de dólares para la construcción de un segundo almacén de carga de 4 mil metros cuadrados en el Aeropuerto Internacional Felipe Ángeles (AIFA), esto en el presente año."Esta inversión se suma a los 2.3 millones de dólares ejecutados en el 2024 para la mejora y ampliación de nuestros almacenes. Talma impulsa una estrategia de inversión progresiva que incluye a México, reafirmando su compromiso con la continuidad y expansión del negocio, así como con nuestra consolidación en mercados clave”, señaló Vladimir Muñoz, director general de la compañía.¿Cuál es el objetivo de la inversión?En un comunicado, la empresa expuso que con esta nueva infraestructura, el AIFA podrá duplicar su capacidad de carga y seguir con sus planes de crecimiento en México.Talma especificó que este desembolso forma parte de toda una estrategia de expansión en América Latina, con una inversión de 50 millones de dólares.Se detalló que los países donde se realizará este desembolso son Perú, Colombia, México y Ecuador. La empresa indicó que algunas de las labores que realizarán son la construcción de nuevos talleres de mantenimiento para optimizar la gestión de los equipos de apoyo en tierra (GSE), fundamentales en las operaciones aeroportuarias en Perú, especialmente en el nuevo aeropuerto Jorge Chávez. Asimismo, realizarán la adquisición de equipos especializados de última tecnología para el equipamiento del recién inaugurado Centro Especializado en el Aeropuerto El Dorado, en Colombia. Talma puntualizó que se encuentra en el proceso para prestar servicios aeroportuarios en Argentina, plaza que ve muy atractiva, porque considera que es un mercado que se está recuperando y abre oportunidades a diferentes actores privados.La empresa reportó que gestiona, actualmente, más de 202 mil toneladas anuales de carga en América Latina. La compañía, que fue fundada en Perú como parte del Grupo Sandoval y tiene presencia en cerca de 50 aeropuertos en Colombia, México, Perú y Ecuador.KL
data.translatedTitle: Talma announces investment of 9 MDD for load warehouse in AIFA
data.translatedDescription: The Airport Services Company, Talma, reported that it will invest 9 million dollars for the construction of a second load warehouse of 4 thousand square meters at the Felipe Ángeles International Airport (AIFA), this in this year. "This investment adds to the 2.3 million dollars executed in 2024 for the improvement and expansion of our warehouses. Talma promotes a progressive investment strategy that includes Mexico, reaffirming its commitment to Mexico continuity and expansion of the business, as well as with our consolidation in key markets, ”said Vladimir Muñoz, general director of the company. What is the objective of the investment? In a statement, the company explained that with this new infrastructure, the AIFA can double its load capacity and continue its growth plans in Mexico. Steal dollars. It was detailed that the countries where this disbursement will be carried out are Peru, Colombia, Mexico and Ecuador. The company indicated that some of the work they will carry out are the construction of new maintenance workshops to optimize the management of land support equipment (GSE), fundamental in airport operations in Peru, especially in the new Jorge Chávez airport. They will also carry out the acquisition of latest technology specialized teams for the equipment of the newly opened center specialized at El Dorado airport, in Colombia. Talma pointed out that it is in the process to provide airport services in Argentina, a place that sees very attractive, because it considers that it is a market that is recovering and opens opportunities to different private actors. The company reported that it manages, currently, more than 202 thousand tons of charge in Latin America. The company, which was founded in Peru as part of the Sandoval Group and has a presence in about 50 airports in Colombia, Mexico, Peru and Ecuador.kl

data.title: García Harfuch garantiza seguridad en elección judicial del 1 de junio
data.description: El secretario de Seguridad, Omar García Harfuch, garantizó protección a la integridad de quienes acudan a votar el domingo 1 de junio en la elección judicial, así como a los comicios municipales de Durango y Veracruz.“Para ello habrá un gran despliegue de la Guardia Nacional y una gran coordinación con todas las entidades federativas, por lo que habrá seguridad para la gente que acuda a las urnas”, dijo.Gobierno no caerá en provocación de la CNTE: HarfuchEn conferencia de prensa, al finalizar su reunión con la Junta de Coordinación Política de la Cámara de Diputados, se refirió al amago de la Coordinadora Nacional de Trabajadores de la Educación (CNTE) de boicotear la elección de jueces, magistrados y ministros.Dijo que, si bien el gobierno no incurrirá en un acto de represión, sí garantizará el bienestar de los ciudadanos.“Es un gobierno, como lo ha dicho la presidenta Claudia Sheinbaum, nosotros prevenimos, no vamos a caer en ninguna provocación o en algún acto de represión. “Por supuesto, vamos a garantizar el bienestar de la ciudadanía, como lo hizo la Policía de la Ciudad de México, que también actuaron de manera, verdaderamente con un temple impresionante en estos últimos días y así lo seguiremos garantizando”, remarcó.—¿Habrá seguridad para la ciudadanía que desea acudir a las urnas?—, insistieron los representantes de los medios informativos."Por supuesto que sí, definitivamente habrá seguridad", atajó.Estrategia funciona, delitos han reducido: secretario de SeguridadGarcía Harfuch afirmó además que la estrategia de seguridad ha funcionado con grandes resultados en el combate al crimen organizado y la reducción de 25 por ciento de homicidios dolosos de octubre a la fecha.“¿Estamos diciendo que ya está resuelto el tema? Por supuesto que no, pero la gente tiene que saber que hay 25 por ciento menos homicidios de lo que había ocurrido, es la cifra más baja desde el 2018.“Entonces, la estrategia funciona, es una estrategia que no es cambiante, es una estrategia que dirige la presidenta Claudia Sheinbaum todos los días en el gabinete y que estamos seguros que, en coordinación con las entidades federativas, vamos a entregar más resultados a la ciudadanía”, aseguró.IOGE
data.translatedTitle: García Harfuch guarantees judicial choice of June 1
data.translatedDescription: The Secretary of Security, Omar García Harfuch, guaranteed protection of the integrity of those who come to vote on Sunday, June 1 in the judicial election, as well as the municipal elections of Durango and Veracruz. "For this there will be a great deployment of the National Guard and a great coordination with all the federative entities, so there will be security for the people who go to the polls," he said. data.title: Liga MX eliminará el Play In de la fase final previo al Mundial 2026
data.description:
Mikel Arriola, comisionado interino de la Federación Mexicana de Futbol, anunció que el Play In de la Liga MX se eliminará para el Clausura 2026 previo a la Copa del Mundo para apoyar la planeación de Javier Aguirre, director técnico de la selección mexicana.Luego de la Asamblea de Dueños de la Liga MXde este lunes 26 de mayo, el directivo de la FMF anunció cambios y medidas que se tomarán en el torneo del futbol mexicano rumbo al Mundial del que México será anfitrión.El directivo dijo los propietarios confirmaron el proyecto de Aguirre, quien tendrá 50 por ciento más partidos de preparación, comparado a otras naciones.“Fuimos a ver a todos los dueños en los últimos dos meses para presentarles las razones y causas que Aguirre requiere de la Liga MX para efectos de tener las mejores condiciones para el Mundial”.¿Por qué se quitará el Play In de la Liga MX?La medida de suspender la fase previa a los cuartos de final del torneo es para beneficiar el proceso del Vasco en el Tri de cara a su participación en la Copa del Mundo, por lo que la idea es liberar lo jugadores de la Liga MX mucho antes.Lo anterior es para que Aguirre pueda tener a sus seleccionados al menos mes y medio antes del inicio de la justa mundialista en México, por lo que además deberán tener dos partidos de preparación en enero y dos concentraciones de entrenamiento.“Nuestra fase final del primer semestre del próximo año será sin seleccionados para entregar a los jugadores seis y media semana antes del inicio del Mundial. Jugar la fase final del Clausura 2026 sin Play In y luego se analizará si se quita de forma definitiva. Dos partidos en enero sin afectar a la Liga MX. Dos campamentos de entrenamiento, uno en 2025 y otro en 2026", indicó Arriola.Mikel Arriola explica algunos puntos del plan de Javier Aguirre para la Copa del Mundo.????: @Viioletitta ???? https://t.co/vixkdsaHWT pic.twitter.com/zUZwosiG2P— La Afición (@laaficion) May 26, 2025


Otra de las novedades que se dio a conocer tras la junta de dueños, es que para el torneo Clausura 2026, que es previo al Mundial en México, Estados Unidos y Canadá, los equipos estarán obligados a soltar a sus jugadores varis semanas antes del fin del torneo.En la presentación que se mostró en la famosa conferencia tras la junta de dueños, se muestra que el plan es que los jugadores mexicanos que irán al Mundial y que jueguen en la Liga MX, se concentren 6.5 semanas antes del comienzo del torneo.Con esta iniciativa, los equipos con mexicanos seleccionados no podrán contar con ellos durante la etapa final del campeonato, es decir, Cuartos, Semis y Final.MGC​
data.translatedTitle: Liga MX will eliminate the play in from the final phase prior to the 2026 World Cup
data.translatedDescription:
Mikel Arriola, an interim commissioner of the Mexican Football Federation, announced that the Play in the MX League will be eliminated for the Clausura 2026 prior to the World Cup to support the planning of Javier Aguirre, technical director of the Mexican National Team. After the Assembly of Owners of the MXDE League this Monday, May 26, the FMF manager announced changes and measures that will be taken in the tournament. Mexican towards the World Cup in which Mexico will be host. The manager said the owners confirmed the Aguirre project, who will have 50 percent more preparation matches, compared to other nations. “We went to see all the owners in the last two months to present the reasons and causes that Aguirre requires the MX League for the purpose of having the best conditions for the World Cup.” Suspending the phase prior to the quarterfinals of the tournament is to benefit the process of the Basque in the Tri for its participation in the World Cup, so the idea is to release the players of the MX League much earlier. First semester of next year will be without selected to deliver to the players six and a half week before the start of the World Cup. The World Cup. https://t.co/vixkdsahwt pic.twitter.com/zuzwosig2p— The fans (@laaffiction) May 26, 2025


Another novelty that was released after the Junta de Owners, is that for the Clausura 2026 tournament, which is prior to the World Cup in Mexico, the United States and Canada, the teams will be obliged to release their players varis weeks before the end of the tourna MX, 6.5 weeks are concentrated before the start of the tournament. With this initiative, teams with selected Mexicans will not be able to count on them during the final stage of the championship, that is, rooms, semis and end.mgc

data.title: Loi Duplomb sur l’agriculture : comment les partisans du texte ont réussi à court-circuiter les débats à l’Assemblée nationale
data.description: Dans une ambiance particulièrement tendue, les députés du centre jusqu’à l’extrême droite ont voté la motion de rejet portée, paradoxalement, par le rapporteur de la proposition de loi, ce qui permet de l’envoyer directement en commission mixte paritaire. La gauche dénonce un « déni démocratique ».
data.translatedTitle: DUPLomb law on agriculture: how supporters of the text managed to short-circuit the debates in the National Assembly
data.translatedDescription: In a particularly tense atmosphere, the deputies from the center to the extreme right voted the motion of rejection carried, paradoxically, by the rapporteur of the bill, which allows it to be sent directly to the joint joint committee. The left denounces a "democratic denial".

data.title: Elon Musk retourne à ses affaires, après l’échec du DOGE
data.description: Le patron de SpaceX et Tesla quitte son poste de conseiller du président américain juste avant la date butoir du 28 mai, au-delà de laquelle il n’aurait pu rester dans l’équipe gouvernementale sans remplir des obligations de transparence et de contrôle du Congrès.
data.translatedTitle: Elon Musk returns to his business, after the Doge failure
data.translatedDescription: The boss of SpaceX and Tesla leaves his post as adviser to the American president just before the deadline of May 28, beyond which he could not have stayed in the government team without fulfilling transparency and control obligations of the congress.

data.title: Des données officielles confirment la pollution autour de l’incinérateur d’Ivry-Paris XIII, l’un des plus grands et anciens d’Europe
data.description: L’analyse des mesures de retombées atmosphériques réalisées par le gestionnaire montre des niveaux de dioxines plus élevés à proximité de l’usine.
data.translatedTitle: Official data confirm pollution around the incinerator of Ivry-Paris XIII, one of the largest and old in Europe
data.translatedDescription: Analysis of atmospheric spinoff measurements carried out by the manager shows higher dioxin levels near the factory.

data.title: La NASA réussit à rallumer un des propulseurs de Voyager 1, après vingt et un ans d’inactivité
data.description: Le propulseur de roulis d’appoint étant menacé d’obstruction, les ingénieurs du Jet Propulsion Laboratory ont réussi à rallumer le propulseur principal de la sonde, à près de 25 milliards de kilomètres de distance.
data.translatedTitle: NASA manages to turn on one of the propellants to travel 1, after twenty -one years of inactivity
data.translatedDescription: The auxiliary roll propeller being threatened with obstruction, the engineers of the Jet Propulsion Laboratory managed to rekindle the main propellant of the probe, almost 25 billion kilometers away.

data.title: En direct, guerre en Ukraine : le point sur la situation
data.description: Volodymyr Zelensky a dénoncé « le choix de [Vladimir] Poutine, et de la Russie, de continuer à se battre et à détruire des vies » après que Moscou a lancé, selon le président ukrainien, « plus de 900 attaques de drones en trois jours ».
data.translatedTitle: Live, war in Ukraine: the point on the situation
data.translatedDescription: Volodymyr Zelensky denounced "the choice of [Vladimir] Putin, and Russia, to continue to fight and destroy lives" after Moscow launched, according to the Ukrainian president, "more than 900 drone attacks in three days".

data.title: En Turquie, Recep Tayyip Erdogan accouche d’un décret anticésarienne
data.description: Afin d’enrayer un indice de fécondité au plus bas, le chef de l’Etat multiplie les initiatives. Sans grand effet. La pratique des césariennes, à contre-courant des objectifs démographiques de l’Etat, poursuit son essor.
data.translatedTitle: In Türkiye, Recep Tayyip Erdogan gives birth to an anti -scare decree
data.translatedDescription: In order to stop an index of fertility at the lowest, the Head of State multiplies initiatives. Without much effect. The practice of cesarean women, against the current of the demographic objectives of the State, continues its boom.

data.title: Nigeria : nouvelles attaques meurtrières contre des villages du centre du pays
data.description: Ces attaques ont frappé trois villages entre vendredi et dimanche, selon Ormin Torsar Victor, chef du gouvernement local de Gwer West, qui a rapporté une trentaine de morts – un bilan qui n’est pas confirmé par la police locale.
data.translatedTitle: Nigeria: new deadly attacks against villages in the center of the country
data.translatedDescription: These attacks struck three villages between Friday and Sunday, according to Ormin Torsar Victor, local head of government of Gwer West, who reported around thirty dead - a record that is not confirmed by local police.

data.title: Ukraine-Krieg: Donald Trump kritisiert neue Angriffe, spielt aber Putin in die Hände
data.description: Verliert Donald Trump die Geduld mit Wladimir Putin? Diese Frage stellt sich, seit er die jüngsten Angriffe auf die Ukraine scharf kritisierte. Doch der US-Präsident denkt auch dabei vor allem an sich.
data.translatedTitle: Ukraine War: Donald Trump criticizes new attacks, but plays Putin in his hands
data.translatedDescription: Does Donald Trump lose patience with Vladimir Putin? This question has been sharply criticized since he criticized the recent attacks on Ukraine. But the US President also thinks of himself.

data.title: Nordische Staaten nennen Russland »langfristige Gefahr für uns und ganz Europa«
data.description: Die Warnung ist deutlich: Die Regierungschefs aus Nordeuropa sehen in Wladimir Putin eine Bedrohung für den kompletten Kontinent. Bei dem Treffen ging es auch um Donald Trumps Gelüste nach Grönland.
data.translatedTitle: Nordic states call Russia "long -term danger for us and all of Europe"
data.translatedDescription: The warning is clear: the heads of government from Northern Europe see a threat to the entire continent in Vladimir Putin. The meeting also dealt with Donald Trump's cravings in Greenland.

data.title: News: Friedrich Merz, Israel, Gaza, Solingen, Liverpool, Emmanuel Macron
data.description: Wie der Kanzler die deutsche Außenpolitik verändert. Prozessauftakt zum Anschlag von Solingen. Und: ein vermeintliches Skandälchen im Hause Macron. Das ist die Lage am Dienstagmorgen.
data.translatedTitle: News: Friedrich Merz, Israel, Gaza, Solingen, Liverpool, Emmanuel Macron
data.translatedDescription: How the Chancellor changes German foreign policy. Process start to the Solingen attack. And: a supposed scandal in Macron. That is the situation on Tuesday morning.

data.title: Israel: Gaza Humanitarian Foundation soll erste Hilfsgüter verteilt haben
data.description: Während die Uno ausgebremst wird, hat laut Medienberichten nun eine dubiose US-Stiftung erstmals die hungernden Bevölkerung im Gazastreifen versorgt. Israels Armee rückt derweil erneut im Libanon vor.
data.translatedTitle: Israel: Gaza Humanitrian Foundation is said to have distributed the first relief supplies
data.translatedDescription: While the UN is slowed down, according to media reports, a dubious US foundation has now supplied the hungry population in the Gaza Strip for the first time. Meanwhile, Israel's army is moving back to Lebanon.

data.title: Nordkorea verurteilt Donald Trumps »Golden Dome« als Weltraumwettrüsten
data.description: Donald Trump träumt von einem gewaltigen Raketenschild für 175 Milliarden Dollar. Nordkorea ist empört und warnt: Aus dem All könnte ein nukleares Kriegsgebiet werden.
data.translatedTitle: North Korea condemns Donald Trump's "Golden Dome" as a space for armaments
data.translatedDescription: Donald Trump dreams of a huge rocket sign for $ 175 billion. North Korea is outraged and warns: from space could become a nuclear war zone.

data.title: Spanische Polizei zerschlägt Netzwerk von illegalen Schlachthöfen
data.description: Kranke Ziegen wurden inmitten von Schmutz, abgetrennten Tierköpfen und Ratten gehalten: Ermittler haben bei Madrid mehrere unerlaubte Schlachthöfe entdeckt. Belieferte Restaurants mussten dicht machen.
data.translatedTitle: Spanish police smash the network of illegal slaughterhouses
data.translatedDescription: Sick goats were kept in the middle of dirt, separated animal heads and rats: Investigators have discovered several unauthorized slaughterhouses at Madrid. Delivered restaurants had to close.

Leia mais (05/27/2025 - 00h03)
data.translatedTitle: General Director of Aneel foresees Red Flag this year

data.description: A nova etapa do projeto Litro de Luz, que leva alternativas de iluminação para regiões sem distribuição regular de energia, terá o apoio da Audi . A montadora é parceira da iniciativa desde 2022. Leia mais (05/26/2025 - 23h00)

data.translatedDescription: The new stage of the Liter of Light Project, which brings lighting alternatives to regions without regular energy distribution, will have the support of Audi. The automaker has been a partner of the initiative since 2022. Read More (05/26/2025 - 23h00)

data.title: Sem vigilância integrada e constante, não há resposta eficaz contra a gripe aviária
data.description: Em dezembro de 2024, os Estados Unidos confirmaram o primeiro caso grave de infecção humana pelo vírus H5N1 -um homem de 65 anos da Louisiana, com comorbidades, hospitalizado após contato com um animal doméstico infectado. Desde então, o país contabilizou 61 infecções humanas ligadas ao surto em rebanhos bovinos, a maioria entre trabalhadores rurais. A Califórnia, estado mais afetado pela transmissão entre vacas leiteiras, declarou estado de emergência no fim do ano após registrar 34 desses casos humanos e mais de 600 rebanhos contaminados. Leia mais (05/26/2025 - 23h00)
data.translatedTitle: Without integrated and constant surveillance, there is no effective response against avian flu
data.translatedDescription: In December 2024, the United States confirmed the first serious case of human infection by the H5N1 virus -a 65 -year -old man from Louisiana, with comorbidities, hospitalized after contact with an infected domestic animal. Since then, the country has accounted for 61 human infections linked to outbreak in cattle herds, most of them among rural workers. California, a state most affected by the transmission between dairy cows, declared a state of emergency at the end of the year after 34 of these human cases and more than 600 contaminated herds. Read more (05/26/2025 - 23h00)

data.title: Como Marcel Ophuls, sob o signo da Segunda Guerra, buscou a verdade no cinema
data.description: Marcel Ophuls , um dos maiores documentaristas do cinema sonoro, morreu neste sábado (24), aos 97 anos. Ophuls, nasceu em Frankfurt, Alemanha, em 1927 e era filho do grande cineasta Max Ophuls . Teria entre 12 e 13 anos no início da Segunda Guerra. Leia mais (05/26/2025 - 23h00)
data.translatedTitle: Like Marcel Ophuls, under the sign of World War II, sought the truth in cinema
data.translatedDescription: Marcel Ophuls, one of the greatest documentary filmmakers in the sound cinema, died on Saturday (24) at the age of 97. Ophuls, born in Frankfurt, Germany, in 1927 and was the son of the great filmmaker Max Ophuls. It would be between 12 and 13 years old at the beginning of World War II. Read more (05/26/2025 - 23h00)

data.title: Enquanto Alemanha fecha fronteiras, refugiado vira herói em Hamburgo
data.description: Na última sexta-feira (23), uma mulher esfaqueou aleatoriamente 18 pessoas na estação central de trem de Hamburgo. Na plataforma lotada, o ataque só foi interrompido quando um homem descrito como tchetcheno chutou sua perna e um sírio a imobilizou no chão. O primeiro herói continua anônimo; o segundo se chama Muhammad al Muhammad, 19, e ganhou um cappuccino da polícia. Leia mais (05/26/2025 - 23h00)
data.translatedTitle: While Germany closes borders, refugee becomes a hero in Hamburg
data.translatedDescription: Last Friday (23), a woman randomly stabbed 18 people at the Hamburg train station. On the crowded platform, the attack was only interrupted when a man described as Tchetcheno kicked his leg and a Syrian immobilized her on the floor. The first hero remains anonymous; The second is called Muhammad al Muhammad, 19, and won a police cappuccino. Read more (05/26/2025 - 23h00)

data.title: Novo IOF corresponde a alta de até 0,50 ponto na Selic e deve influenciar BC, estimam economistas
data.description: O aumento do IOF (Imposto sobre Operações Financeiras) sobre operações de crédito anunciado na última quinta-feira (22) equivale a uma alta entre 0,20 e 0,50 pontos percentuais na taxa básica de juros , atualmente em 14,75% ao ano. O impacto que deve contribuir para que o Banco Central descarte um novo aumento da Selic neste ano, segundo analistas. Leia mais (05/26/2025 - 23h00)
data.translatedTitle: New IOF corresponds to up to 0.50 point in Selic and should influence BC, estimates economists
data.translatedDescription: The increase in IOF (Financial Operations Tax) on credit operations announced last Thursday (22) is equivalent to a rise between 0.20 and 0.50 percentage points in the basic interest rate, currently at 14.75% per year. The impact that should contribute to the Central Bank to discard a new increase in Selic this year, according to analysts. Read more (05/26/2025 - 23h00)

data.title: Café de Rondônia capta 2,3 vezes mais carbono do que emite
data.description: A cafeicultura é importante meio de subsistência para um grande número de produtores , e boa parte da atividade é exercida por pequenos. O setor passa por um período de forte influência climática e por ameaças comerciais, como a nova lei da União Europeia, que não permitirá a importação de café de áreas com a derrubada de florestas. Leia mais (05/26/2025 - 22h51)
data.translatedTitle: Rondônia coffee captures 2.3 times more carbon than issues
data.translatedDescription: Coffee culture is an important subsistence means for a large number of producers, and much of the activity is performed by small. The sector goes through a period of strong climate influence and commercial threats, such as the new European Union Law, which will not allow coffee imports from areas with the overthrow of forests. Even with the power of the agent's popularity, it is in this stratum that he gets the highest approval rate for his work, of 59%, compared to 48% in the population and only 39% among formal wage earners, according to Datafolha in April. data.title: Todos pela superação da pobreza
data.description: A máxima "superar para prosperar" é, mais que nunca, prioridade inegociável para nossa gestão. Ao assumir o governo do Estado, nos comprometemos a fazer diferente para fazer a diferença. A buscar novos caminhos para obter resultados nunca vistos. Fiéis a esse propósito, construímos o SuperAção SP, um programa inédito, integrado e intersetorial, pensado e construído de forma única para garantir a efetiva superação da pobreza. E por que inédito e por que falamos em superação efetiva? É vital reforçar que, mais que estrutural, a pobreza é multidimensional. E problemas complexos exigem soluções igualmente complexas. Por isso, com muito estudo e diálogo, desenhamos um programa sofisticado, atento a todas as nuances que impedem a real emancipação. Leia mais (05/26/2025 - 22h00)
data.translatedTitle: All for overcoming poverty
data.translatedDescription: The maxim "overcoming to thrive" is, more than ever, non -negotiable priority for our management. By assuming the state government, we commit to making different to make a difference. To look for new ways to get results never seen. Faithful in this regard, we built the overcoming SP, an unprecedented, integrated and intersectoral program, designed and built uniquely to ensure effective overcoming poverty. data.description: O dia 7 de abril de 1994 mudou o destino de Ruanda para sempre. data.translatedTitle: Rwanda has survived a genocide and is one of the safest African countries
data.translatedDescription: April 7, 1994 changed the Rwanda destination forever. It was the beginning of one of the most bloody genocide in history that, in less than one hundred days, caused the death of about 1 million people, according to some estimates. Everything derived from a historical rivalry between two ethnic groups, the Hutus and the Tutsis, inflated by the decades in which the country was colonized by the Belgians. data.title: Pakistan, Iran pledge to work for regional peace
data.description: • Shehbaz, Pezeshkian agree to boost bilateral trade, investment • PM expresses gratitude for Iran’s support amid tension with Delhi • Renews offer for talks with India on Kashmir, other issues  • Meets Ayatollah Khamenei ISLAMABAD: Pakistan and Iran on Monday rene­wed their commitment to permanent peace in South Asia, underlining that frie­ndly relations with neighbouring countries formed a core part of both nations’ foreign policy. The reaffirmation came during Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif’s meeting with Iranian President Dr Masoud Pezeshkian at a reception hosted at the Sa’dabad Palace in Tehran. The meeting took place during the prime minist­er’s official visit to Tur­k­iye, Iran and the United Arab Emirates, aimed at expre­ssing gratitude to fri­endly Muslim nations for their support during the recent Pakistan-India conflict . Both leaders resolved to enhance cooperation to boost bilateral trade and investment and work together to maintain peace and security in the region. View this post on Instagram Prime Minister Shehbaz said Pakistan came out of the crisis with India as victorious because of the “brave actions of our outstanding armed forces, strongly supported by the people of Pakistan”. He added, “We want peace and will work for peace in the region thro­ugh talks on the table and resolve our outstanding iss­ues, including the Kash­mir dispute, according to the United Nations Secu­rity Council resolutions, which were acknowledged even by the Indian Lok Sabha when Nehru was the prime minister of India.” He said Pakistan is ready to talk for the sake of peace on different issues, including water, trade and counterterrorism, “if India is serious”. However, he reaffirmed that if India remained aggressive, Pakistan would defend its sovereignty and territorial integrity. The prime minister said he had a productive and useful meeting with the Iranian president, covering all areas of mutual interest and cooperation. “There was total agreement that the two brotherly neighbouring countries must enhance cooperation in diverse fields, including trade, investment and economy,” he added. Stressing that Pakistan and Iran had deep-rooted cultural and historical relations, he said, “We have decided to transform these relations into a very productive cooperation in various fields of life.” PM Shehbaz also thanked the Iranian president for calling him and showing his concern on the evolving situation in the subcontinent a few weeks ago. “I deeply appreciate your concern and brotherly feelings for the people of Pakistan and your ardent desire that this crisis comes to a grinding halt instead of escalating further,” he told the president. Israeli actions condemned Prime Minister Shehbaz said Pakistan condemned Israeli actions causing untold misery for the people of Gaza, where Israel murdered more than 50,000 Palestinians, and the bloodshed continues. “It is high time that the international community used its influence to bring a lasting ceasefire in Palestine. Pakistan stands by its brothers and sisters in Iran to promote peace, progress and prosperity,” he said. He said Pakistan fully supported Iran’s right to have a civilian nuclear programme. He assured that Pakistan would work with Iran on all issues of mutual concern. The Iranian president stressed that Pakistan and Iran shared a common stance on important regional and international issues on different platforms, including the Organisation of Islamic Cooperation (OIC). President Pezeshkian said the two countries should cooperate on making their borders secure from the activities of terrorists and criminal groups. “Peace and stability in Pakistan are in the interest of Iran. We believe that sustaining security and maintaining friendly and peaceful relations with neighbouring countries is in the interest of the two countries,” he added. He said Iran welcomed the ceasefire between Pakistan and India, adding that settling issues through dialogue was essential for stability in the region. “We believe that to ensure security and stability in the region, neighbouring countries should hold dialogue and have positive consultations with each other and the international partners,” he added. He said the two sides discussed issues facing the Islamic world and the top priority was the issue of Palestine. “As always, we support the cause of Palestine and condemn the atrocities carried out by Israel,” he added. Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Ishaq Dar, Chief of the Army Staff Field Marshal Syed Asim Munir, Information Minister Attaullah Tarar, and Special Assistant to Prime Minister Tariq Fatimi accompanied the prime minister. PM meets Khamenei Later, Prime Minister Shehbaz made a courtesy call to Ayatollah Sayyed Ali Khamenei, the supreme leader of Iran. According to the PM Office, the prime minister briefed the supreme leader about the recent conflict with India and its hegemonistic and revisionist designs. He thanked the Iranian leadership for supporting Pakistan against Indian aggression. The premier underlined that Pakistan always desired peace to prevail in the region leading to economic development and prosperity. Prime Minister Shehbaz briefed the supreme leader about the steps taken to elevate Pakistan-Iran ties to highest levels and maintained that his government was committed to further deepening strategic cooperation with Iran in the complex geopolitical times. He praised the farsightedness of the Iranian leadership in pursuing the nuclear negotiations with the United States and hoped that a constructive deal would be reached between the two countries. The supreme leader appreciated PM Shehbaz’s efforts in promoting regional peace and stability and praised his commitment to further strengthening Pakistan-Iran ties. The supreme leader also prayed for greater prosperity, growth and development of Pakistan and its people. Published in Dawn, May 27th, 2025

data.title: Punjab braces for another spell of downpour from today
data.description: • Govt activates emergency protocols; orders desilting of waterways • PDMA calls for standardised fitting of solar panels to withstand inclement weather • Official says 70pc deaths resulted from falling solar panels LAHORE: Heavy rain and thunderstorms are set to batter Punjab, days after similar weather killed around 20 people across the province. The Provincial Disaster Man­agement Authority (PDMA) Punjab has issued a province-wide alert of severe weather from today (Tuesday). A westerly wave combined with moist currents is likely to bring intense windstorms, thu­nderstorms, and heavy rainfall across the region from May 27 to 31, said the Met department forecast. Upper and central Punjab districts, including Rawal­pi­ndi, Murree, Galliyat, Attock, Chakwal, Jhelum, Mianwali, Sargodha, Hafizabad, Mandi Bahauddin, Sialkot, Narowal, Okara, Lahore, Faisalabad, Jhang, Toba Tek Singh, Gujranwala, Gujrat and Sheikhupura will experience heavy rains with hailstorms and lightning from the evening of May 27 through May 31. Southern districts of DG Khan, Rajanpur, Multan, Bhakkar, Layyah, Bahawalpur, Sahiwal, Pakpattan and Vehari are expected to receive light to moderate rain and thunderstorms during the same period. The authorities warned people to stay away from loose stru­ctures, including electric poles, trees, vehicles and solar panels during thunderstorms and stay indoors as much as possible. The warning was issued as a PDMA assessment showed 70pc of casualties during the thunderstorm three days ago were caused by falling solar panels which were not installed properly. Emergency protocols In light of the fresh forecast, the Punjab government has activated emergency protocols across all districts. The district administrations and all relevant departments, including health, education, irrigation, local government and Rescue 1122, have been put on alert to maintain round-the-clock staffing at emergency operation centres. The provincial cabinet committee on disaster management also convened an emergency meeting on Monday. Health Minister Khawaja Salman Rafiq chaired the mee­ting attended by senior officials and divisional commissioners. The meeting focused on a comprehensive five-point age­nda to strengthen the province’s response to the upcoming monsoon season. PDMA DG Irfan Ali Kathia briefed the committee on the relief body’s preparations. The commissioners and deputy commissioners shared progress reports on ongoing desilting of waterways and mock emergency exercises. Mr Rafiq issued directives for enhanced measures in Gujranwala and Lahore, where above-average monsoon rains are predicted. The meeting approved a special grant for desilting operations in Waha (Rajanpur) and urgent measures to address potential hill torrents in vulnerable areas. The minister stressed the importance of field visits by officers to ensure proper arrangements before monsoon rains. Rawalpindi’s Leh Nullah was specifically identified for priority desilting operations. The meeting also reviewed the Flood Risk Management Survey. Officials revealed plans to survey over 100,000 structures in Dera Ghazi Khan division, with all hill torrent area surveys scheduled for completion by June 22. The committee also approved a crucial model study on river erosion patterns. PDMA helpline The PDMA has also established a communication system to disseminate weather updates and warnings through SMS alerts, mosque announcements and through local representatives. PDMA DG Kathia urged citizens to contact the PDMA helpline at 1129 in case of any emergency. The authority can also be reached on WhatsApp +923178371900 and landline 042-9922135/6 for assistance. PDMA has also directed local authorities to submit daily situation reports. Solar panel regulations The PDMA has taken action against substandard fitting of solar panels after falling plates resulted in the deaths of most of the 19 people who were killed during the windstorm in central and southern Punjab on Saturday. The authority has issued directives to the energy and local government departments and divisional and district administrations for comprehensive guidelines for the installation of solar panels so that they could withstand inclement weather. According to PDMA’s findings, poorly installed solar panels and mounting structures were uprooted during the recent storm, causing fatal accidents across Punjab. Poorly fitted panels and mounts fell from rooftops, resulting in significant loss of life and property. PDMA DG Kathia confirmed that 70pc of the accidents that occurred due to windstorms in the past few days were caused by fallen solar panels or their mounts. He said solar panels installed on rooftops or in open areas should follow proper installation guidelines. He stressed the installation of solar panels should be standardised and certified in the future. The PDMA has instructed district administrations to conduct thorough surveys of existing solar installations to identify and repair dangerous fittings. The installation of all existing and future solar panels must meet strict engineering standards, including the key requirements like use of certified material and mounting equipment, structural approval by relevant authorities and implementation of regular maintenance and inspection protocols, the relief body directed. It also stressed the need to devise standard operating procedures (SOPs) for repairs and periodic safety checks. The energy and local government departments were directed to create a regulatory framework for solar panel installations. The framework would enforce mandatory safety standards and certification processes for all solar energy systems, especially those installed on rooftops and open structures. The PDMA warned that failure to comply with the new guidelines could result in similar tragedies during future extreme weather events. All deputy commissioners have been directed to immediately launch awareness campaigns to educate the public about safe solar panel installation practices while the formal regulations were being developed. Published in Dawn, May 27th, 2025

data.title: Legality of PTI’s relief in reserved seats case contested
data.description: ISLAMABAD: Senior Counsel Makhdoom Ali Khan on Monday informed the Constitutional Bench (CB) of the Supreme Court that Article 187 of the Con­stitution — the basis for the July 12, 2024 majority judgement which granted relief to the PTI in the res­e­rved seats case — does not em­p­ower the apex co­urt to grant relief to a party that was not before it. “Article 187 is a provision which allows the Sup­r­eme Court to decide a mat­ter in a complete sense, but not to settle a dispute or grant relief to a party which is not before the court,” argued the counsel representing the candidates who were denied res­erved seats after the Ele­ction Commission of Pak­is­tan (ECP) quashed a not­ification that had allocated special seats for women to them. “At times, in a dispute, the court can mould relief for one of the contesting parties, since there can be a situation where a party is entitled to more relief,” the counsel added. Justice Jamal Khan Mandokhail, a member of the 11-judge CB hearing a set of review petitions against the July 12 majority judgement, questioned, “If a matter relates to public importance, should the Supreme Court not exercise this provision in exceptional circumstances or remain restricted like a civil court from exercising its jurisdiction?” He further asked whether the Supreme Court could “shut its eyes” when presiding officers failed to perform their duties according to law. He noted that, irrespective of whether someone was a party or not, people should not be disenfranchised merely because they failed to approach the court. The counsel cited Justice Yahya Afridi — now Chief Justice of Pakistan — who in his note stated that while the Supreme Court has the power to interpret the Constitution, it does not have the authority to rewrite it. Justice Afridi had cautioned that relying on Article 187 to grant relief to a party not before the court could create a dangerous and far-reaching precedent. It risked undermining due process and potentially led to judicial overreach. Therefore, such powers must be exercised only in compelling and exceptional cases to bolster the rights of an aggrieved party, while remaining within constitutional bounds, he emphasised. The counsel further argued that no party can directly file a petition under Article 187 of the Constitution before the Supreme Court, and reminded that the jurisdictional requirements of Articles 184, 185, 186, 186A or 188 must be satisfied for the Supreme Court to act. He pointed out that the Supreme Court has consistently held that election disputes should be treated like civil disputes, where the burden of proof lies on the challenger. Justice Musarrat Hilali observed that the Sunni Ittehad Council (SIC) likely had only one member in the National Assembly and questioned on what grounds the PTI was granted reserved seats through the July 12 judgement. She asked whether the court acted on some kind of suo motu basis. Justice Hilali also recalled that the majority judgement had taken an independent stance to provide relief to a party — PTI — that was not before the Peshawar High Court, and which had only moved an application before the Supreme Court to act as an intervener for assistance. The counsel argued that Article 187 was referenced 10 times in the majority verdict as the basis for invoking the doctrine of constitutional fidelity and for doing complete justice. However, he emphasised that Article 187 is not a jurisdictional provision, but rather a procedural one that enables the court to do complete justice in matters already pending before it. Accordingly, the case must first be brought before the Supreme Court under Articles 184 to 185, 186, 186A or 188. Article 187, he said, merely allows the court to overcome procedural hurdles and technicalities in such matters. Justice Hilali also questioned the status of the PTI, which was not permitted to contest the general elections under a common election symbol, asking whether it remained a political party despite the restrictions it faced. Justice Aminuddin Khan, who is heading the 11-judge CB, reminded that the dispute over reserved seats was based on the number of seats procured. The counsel argued that none of the 80 candidates in question had approached the Supreme Court, yet the majority judgement granted reserved seats to all 80 PTI candidates — after the legal and constitutional deadline had passed — even though PTI was not a petitioner before any legal forum. He pointed out that those candidates could have joined the PTI or approached the court, but instead they chose to affiliate with the SIC. Therefore, they were not petitioners, and allocating seats to them was clearly against constitutional provisions. He also noted that all 13 judges of the July 12 judgement had unanimously held that a political party which did not contest the general elections or secure any seat was not entitled to reserved seats. The SIC, the counsel argued, did not contest the general elections for any seat. Its chairman ran as an independent candidate. The 80 candidates in question joined the SIC, which although a registered political party, did not contest or win any seats in the general elections. The counsel also reminded that under Article 225 of the Constitution, election disputes must be raised only through an election petition — yet the ECP’s notification allocating reserved seats to the petitioners was quashed. Faisal Siddiqi, the counsel for the SIC, will begin his arguments on Tuesday. Published in Dawn, May 27th, 2025

data.title: Budget features bold measures for ‘strategic direction’
data.description: • Finance minister hints at simplified tax returns for salaried class • Claims every possible support to be made available for armed forces • Privatisation drive to be ‘accelerated’ in next fiscal year; PIA, three Discos to be privatised by year end • Flags population growth, climate change as existential threats ISLAMABAD: Promising simplified tax returns for the salaried class, Finance Minister Muhammad Aura­ng­zeb on Monday pledged that the up­co­ming federal budget would int­ro­duce “bold measures” to steer the national economy in a strategic direction and make available whatever support is required by the armed forces. Talking to journalists after an event organised by the Pakistan Banks Association and Karandaaz Pakistan, the finance minister said that every possible support would be provided to the armed forces, stressing that it was a national need in light of recent cross-border aggression, not just a military requirement. Responding to a question, he said the IMF mission and its regional dir­e­ctor, Jihad Azour, and executive dir­ector, Bahador Bijani, had retur­ned after concluding the mission in Islam­abad and completing discussions on the broad contours of the budget. The discussions would continue virtually this week on a few new things that might crop up from Pakistan’s side or from their side, but a lot of support was available from the IMF, he said. Mr Aurangzeb said the IMF app­roved Pakistan’s first biannual rev­iew and additional financing strictly on merit because all structural and qualitative benchmarks had been completed. He noted that Pakistan’s resolve to stay the course played a key role in overcoming challenges, including attempts to derail the IMF board meeting and create problems. Responding to a question on budget delay, the minister said the country’s leadership had prioritised expressing gratitude to friendly nations who stood by Pakistan amid heightened tensions with India. Budget finalisation would resume upon the leadership’s return. Earlier, Mr Aurangzeb said Pakis­tan’s turnaround story for macroeconomic stabilisation had received glo­bal appreciation. He said an equally strong message from friends and development partners was to stay the course and that was also the government’s commitment to move ahead with structural reforms in taxation, energy, state-owned enterprises (SOEs) and public finance. He said it was easy to go for a sugar rush and pump liquidity in the system, but that was a well-known route the country had treaded multiple times before and landed in a balance of payments crisis as Pakistan is an import-dependent economy. He promised to resist that temptation to break the boom-and-bust cycle. Simpler tax returns The minister said the taxation reform was now led by the private sector and the purpose was to minimise human interaction through people, process and technology and address theft, leakage and corruption through transparency. He said the government would ensure simplified tax returns and forms for the salaried class. He said that around 70 to 80 per cent of salaried people did not hold equity and fixed-income portfolios. “They receive salaries through bank accounts with tax deducted at source. They should not have to fill in 140-150 data points,” he said, adding that the government aimed to reduce that number to just nine — five for wealth tax and four for income tax. The minister conceded that 24 state-owned enterprises transferred to the Privatisation Commission last year did not go well. However, he said the process would now be accelerated, with transactions involving Pakistan International Airlines (PIA), three power distribution companies and some financial institutions expected to reach completion by the end of this year. Mr Aurangzeb said debt servicing was the single-largest expenditure on the public finance side, and therefore, the government would have to ensure fiscal discipline to reduce borrowing and thus curtail debt servicing costs. While the Debt Management Office is being restructured, he emphasised that its goal should go beyond reducing interest payments and instead help create economic value — or “alpha” — to put the economy on a sustainable growth path. “That is where we are going to bring very bold measures in the coming budget to give strategic direction where the economy is headed” and change the DNA of the economy and not to just give an account of expenditure and revenue, Mr Aurangzeb said. However, he warned that population growth and climate change were existential threats already impacting the country. Therefore, the government was also engaged with development partners and the IMF to support adaptation policies, he added. Published in Dawn, May 27th, 2025

data.title: Internet in Panjgur to remain suspended for six months
data.description: ISLAMABAD: A National Asse­mbly panel was informed on Monday that internet services in Panjgur will remain suspended for next six months over security concerns. The committee was informed that the security agencies had responded to a letter from the Ministry of Interior stating that, due to the prevailing security and law and order situation, internet services in Panjgur district would remain suspended for the next six months. The NA Standing Committee on Information Technology, held with Aminul Haq in the chair was told that this has been communicated to the interior ministry by security agencies in response to a letter, citing prevailing law and order situation as the reason. Expressing concern over this situation, the committee noted that internet services in Panjgur have remained suspended for the past three years, causing severe difficulties for the local population, particularly the business community and students. Consequently, the committee decided to convene an in-camera meeting wherein the Secretary Interior would brief the committee in detail about the specific law and order situation that necessitates the continued suspension of internet services. National Party lawmaker Pullain Baloch informed the committee that the people of his constituency (NA-258) have to travel from 15kms to 20kms only to access internet services. He said PTCL’s internet coverage in the area was nearly non-existent. Subsequently, the committee directed the PTA chairman to conduct a survey of the internet coverage in the mentioned region and submit a detailed report to the committee. Decision taken due to security concerns, NA panel told Meanwhile, the NA committee was briefed that a total of 4.6 million students had been provided training through 19 batches under 15 most in-demand freelancing courses. Among the trained individuals, 28pc were female. The committee was further informed that according to a survey conducted in October 2024, freelancers and trainees who received training through Ignite’s programmes collectively generated revenue amounting to US$1.65 billion. Ignite informed the committee that it had introduced 10 additional courses, bringing the total number of courses to 25. These include programmes and projects related to artificial intelligence. The committee directed Ignite to submit a district-wise list of student enrollments from Balochistan. Regarding female enrollment, the committee directed Ignite to make efforts to increase the current 28pc female participation across various courses to at least 50pc, in order to ensure greater inclusion and empowerment of women in the national workforce. The committee expressed concern over the absence of the CEO of PTCL and issued instructions to ensure he appears before the lawmakers in next meeting of the committee. It was brought to the panel’s attention that PTCL was allegedly planning to sell certain properties, including some high-value assets. The committee directed PTCL to present the specific clauses of its sales and purchase agreements that authorise the company to proceed with the sale of these properties. Besides ministry officials and MNA Adil Khan Bazai, lawmakers Zulfiqar Ali Bhatti, Dr Mahesh Kumar Malani, Sadiq Ali Memon, Sharmila Sahiba Farooqui Hashaam, Ahmad Saleem Siddiqui, Pullain Baloch, Awais Haider Jakhar, and Umair Khan Niazi attended the meeting. Published in Dawn, May 27th, 2025
